channel.title: I need my server to keep log of all commands used and by who!
channel.description:
The topic says it pretty much
This will be awsome! I really need it and much appriciated who ever makes or helps me make one.
This is how I want it to look:
TimeStamp, User, Command
Thanks!!!!!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2007, 01:14:35 AM[/size][hr]Ohh come on someone has to know
